Welcome to SIC-POVM's documentation!
====================================

Python code for the numerical search for SIC-POVMs. These docs contain an overview of the structure of the code. The various modules and their most important classes and functions are linked to below.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   api/modules.rst
